enWisdom: Consulting the ignorant person who is concerned for you one is dangerous

Wisdom: اسْتَشِرْ عَدُوَّكَ الْعَاقِلَ وَاحْذَرْ رَأْيَ صَدِيقِكَ الْجَاهِلِ
enWisdom: Consult your intelligent enemy and be wary of the opinion of your ignorant friend

Wisdom: لَا تُشَاوِرَنَّ فِي أَمْرِكَ مَنْ يَجْهَلُ
enWisdom: Never consult with the ignorant in your affairs
Do not consult with your enemy and hide your information [from him]

Wisdom: لَا تُدْخِلَنَّ فِي مَشُورَتِكَ بَخِيلًا فَيَعْدِلَ بِكَ عَنِ الْقَصْدِ وَيَعِدَكَ الْفَقْرَ
enWisdom: Do not include a miser in your consultation as he will turn you away from the goal and frighten you with poverty

Wisdom: لَا تُشْرِكَنَّ فِي رَأْيِكَ جَبَاناً يُضَعِّفْكَ عَنِ الْأَمْرِ [الْأُمُورِ] وَيُعَظِّمْ عَلَيْكَ مَا لَيْسَ بِعَظِيمٍ
enWisdom: Never include a coward in your consultation as he will weaken your resolve in the matter and [will] make a mountain out of a mole hill

Wisdom: لَا تُشْرِكَنَّ فِي مَشُورَتِكَ حَرِيصاً يُهَوِّنْ عَلَيْكَ الشَّرَّ وَيُزَيِّنْ لَكَ الشَّرَهَ
enWisdom: Never include a greedy person in your consultation as he will facilitate evil [deeds] and glamorize avarice for you

Wisdom: لَا تَسْتَشِرِ الْكَذَّابَ فَإِنَّهُ كَالسَّرَابِ يُقَرِّبُ عَلَيْكَ الْبَعِيدَ وَيُبَعِّدُ عَلَيْكَ [إِلَيْكَ‏] الْقَرِيبَ
enWisdom: Do not consult the liar, for indeed he is like the mirage that makes the distant seem near and the near seem distant
The bane of consultation is contradiction of opinions
When the answer is overcomplicated, correctness is negated
The most evil of opinions is that which goes against the laws of Islam
